title: Cant Change back to old client, after the new version?
body: I've been trying to change back to the old client after the new one, and it completely shuts down the whole client, any ideas on how i can fix it or how i can change it back manualy?

replies.body:
Hey there,

You should be able to launch the old client from within your games installation directory (lol.launcher.exe) or by clicking the  "Launch Legacy Client" text on the alpha clients login screen.
